array.string: On the main menu choose ‘Others’
Choose ‘Transfer’
Choose ‘Online Transfer’
Enter the number 013 (code 013 and 16-digit Virtual Account Number
Enter the full amount to be paid. If the amount entered is not the same as the invoiced amount, the transaction will be declined
Empty the transfer reference number and press ‘Correct’
Amount to be paid, account number, and merchant name will appear on the payment confirmation page. If the information is correct, press ‘Correct’
On the main menu choose ‘Other Transaction’
Choose ‘Transfer’
Choose ‘Other Bank Account’
Enter the number 013 (Bank Permata Code) and choose ‘Correct’
Enter the full amount to be paid. If the amount entered is not the same as the invoiced amount, the transaction will be declined
Enter 16 digits payment Account No. and press ‘Correct’
Amount to be paid, account number, and merchant name will appear on the payment confirmation page. If the information is correct, press ‘Correct’
On the main menu choose ‘Others Transaction’
Choose ‘Payment’
Choose ‘Other Payment’
Choose ‘Virtual Account’
Enter 16 digits payment Account No. and press ‘Correct’
Amount to be paid, account number, and merchant name will appear on the payment confirmation page. If the information is correct, press ‘Correct’
Choose your payment account and press ‘Correct’
